channel.title: Unique Mystic Change
channel.description:
It's now confirmed that Casual Mode is being put into custom games only, and from what I could assume, Mystic became un-Unique so that there would be multiple BD Socials in Casual Mode.
However, to balance the strength of Mystic, I think that it should become Unique again.
Reasons are that 1. Mystic is one of the most confirmable classes, with the all-unique Link Minds and Conduit. 2. Mystics can confirm the other Mystic via Link Minds/Conduit targeting them.
Having a class that can easily confirm itself AND confirm others is a big no in considering the balance between town and scum. And having 2 of them in the same game exponentially squares their raw power level.
So while point #1 can't be removed without removing its utility as a neighborizer and night communicator, I think Mystic should be unique so that there isn't two of them, and so that they can't confirm each other (or stab each other in the back when one realizes that the other is converted.)

item.dc:creator: RawkHawk
item.description:
Very much agreed. Mystic is a very strong class, even if it’s prince jr. Mystic is still able to get claims quickly. Having 2 mystics and a prince alive means claims are gotten extremely quickly. And killing one isn’t enough since the others are still alive and have access to the now dead player’s logs.

It’s not often two mystics spawn, but when they do, it’s extreme hard mode for evils.
